purpose: Provide a stable, deterministic identifier for every deploy in order to correlate canaries, telemetry, and risk evaluation across systems.
calculation: build_id = <commit_hash>-<ci_build_number>; build_timestamp = build creation time; environment explicit
outputRange: String, globally unique per deploy within the same environment
gatingImpact: BLOCK if build_id or commit_hash missing, or build_id duplicated in environment; telemetry without build_id is invalid for gating
